Amazon.com | Seattle | Full-time | Software Engineer/Web Developer

Come join a new team at Amazon that is growing fast with lots of room for career growth. You'll be helping define and create a new type of customer experience.

We own customer-facing products, integration with various Amazon program features such as Kindle and Prime, and back-end platform components. Work for our team and get a chance to touch the full spectrum of Amazon technologies.

The team is great, gets things done, and likes to have fun.

Email me, davjosh@amazon.com, for more details.
